title: External Spec Integration Output
description: Output from external spec integration, including archived spec location and created workflow items.

workflow_id.description: Workflow ID associated with this integration (directory format: <id>-<name>)

is_hierarchical.description: Whether the spec was decomposed into an epic with child features

archived_path.description: Relative path to the archived external spec in .sdd/archive/external-specs/

items_created.description: Workflow items created from the external spec

change_id.description: Assigned change ID (format: <name>-<seq>, e.g. user-auth-1), or null if not yet assigned

title.description: Display title for the workflow item
